member.name: P:BundleTransformer.Autoprefixer.Configuration.AutoprefixerSettings.Flexbox
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag for whether to add prefixes for flexbox properties. With "no-2009" value Autoprefixer will add prefixes only for final and IE versions of specification.

member.summary: Gets or sets a flag for whether to add IE prefixes for Grid Layout properties
